author: whyrusleeping
content: me and <@!96996691282001920> are from the Filecoin team, here to discuss some fun EIP 1559 things

author: kubuxu
content: Hi. I'm Kubuxu, one of the devs of Filecoin. As you probably heard we've implemented our version of EIP1559 in Filecoin.

author: kubuxu
content: oh, looks like you got the introduction first ;p

author: kubuxu
content: I'm sure we can exchange some knowledge. I have to say we for sure stress tested EIP1559 in our spacerace (a test network with real rewards).

author: whyrusleeping
content: (about a million messages per day, with about 4 million *real* FIL on the line)

author: kubuxu
content:
I have one initial question:
Why did you made inclusion of messages with FeeCap < BaseFee invalid? It seemed like a nice mechanic, allowing higher nonce messages cover too low FeeCap of earlier ones.

author: afdudley
content: Hi folks thanks for joining us. I'm excited to have you here.
